channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Influencer Esther Thomas, Known Online as ‘Sunshine,’ Dies After Undergoing Surgery
item.description: The content creator had a combined following of nearly 500,000 across Instagram and Facebook for her comedic, skit-style videos

item.title: Scott Adams, Disgraced “Dilbert” Creator, Dies at 68
item.description: 'Dilbert' was pulled from wide circulation after Adams’ racist rant in 2023
